section.title: comment types master list of Comment Types
section.para: To access the master list of Comment Types, select the "Comment Types" option. The following screen will appear:
The "Comment Types" screen displays information on all existing Comment Types, including Comment Type name and Comment Type description.

note.para:
comment types system-defined
comment types user-defined User-defined Comment Types may be edited or deleted. The "General" system-defined Comment Type may also be edited, but the system-defined Comment Types cannot be deleted.
